member.name: T:SSG.PDF.WebService.PDFCreatorWebService
member.summary: The class PDFCreatorWebService contains methods for performing creating tex file from string content, generate pdf document from tex file, checking status state of generating the pdf documents and get location of generated a pdf file.
member.author: Phoonperm Suwannarattaphoom

member.name: M:SSG.PDF.WebService.PDFCreatorWebService.GeneratePDFFromContent(System.String)
member.summary: Generate a pdf document file from the string content.
member.returns: Return the uniqueidentified of tex and pdf files. Empty uniqueidentified if creating failure.

member.name: M:SSG.PDF.WebService.PDFCreatorWebService.GeneratePDFFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Generate a pdf document file from the latex file.
member.param: The uniqueidentified string of tex file name.
member.returns: Return the uniqueidentified of pdf files. Empty uniqueidentified if creating failure.

member.name: M:SSG.PDF.WebService.PDFCreatorWebService.GetStatus(System.String)
member.summary: Get a pdf requested status from database.
member.returns: The status of a pdf requested.

member.name: M:SSG.PDF.WebService.PDFCreatorWebService.GetPdfUri(System.String)
member.summary: Getting pdf file location from specified id.
member.returns: The location of pdf file name

member.name: M:SSG.PDF.WebService.PDFCreatorWebService.GetConfigFile
member.summary: Get configuration file from execution path
